EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_Pivotal_Roadshow_Q216.Reminder - Dallas
EmailTemplate.subject: See you tomorrow at the Pivotal Cloud Native Roadshow!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for signing up to attend the Cloud Native Roadshow taking place tomorrow in Dallas.
Pivotal Cloud Native Roadshow—Dallas Tuesday, June 28th, 2016 8:30am – 9:30am Breakfast 9:30am – 12:00pm Sessions 12:00pm – 1:00pm Lunch 1:00pm – 3:30pm Sessions Roadshow Agenda <[[http://pivotal.io/event/pivotal-cloud-native-roadshow/dallas?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=pivotal-roadshow-2016-Dallas]]>
Location DFW Innovation Center <[[http://dfwinnovationcenter.com/index.html]]> 1201 International Parkway #200 Richardson, Texas 75081 DFW IC Training Room Free Parking On-Site Map & Directions <[[https://www.google.com/maps/place/1201+International+Pkwy+%23200,+Richardson,+TX+75081/@32.962519,-96.711576,17z/data=!3m1!4b1!4m5!3m4!1s0x864c1f1ef5d9edf5:0x7b63340092c16d78!8m2!3d32.962519!4d-96.7093873]]>
Questions? Contact Peter Schmitt at pschmitt@pivotal.io <[[mailto:pschmitt@pivotal.io]]>.
We look forward to seeing you!
The Pivotal Team
